body:
fixes #19966

Modifications to the recipe:
 - [x] Global arrays supports GCC 10 since version 5.7.1, therefore a conflict has been added to avoid old releases to error at build-time.
- [x] Removed the `blas` and `lapack` variant since BLAS and LAPACK are always a dependency and, if not specified during configure, a version of these APIs vendored with Global Arrays is built.
- [x] Fixed a few options in configuration to locate BLAS, LAPACK and SCALAPACK correctly.
- [x] Build shared libraries too.
title: globalarrays: added v5.8 and earlier, simplified recipe
